dr.inference.markovchain
Class MarkovChain

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.markovchain.MarkovChain

public final class MarkovChain
extends java.lang.Object

A concrete markov chain. This is final as the only things that should need overriding are in the delegates (prior, likelihood, schedule and acceptor). The design of this class is to be fairly immutable as far as settings goes.

Version:
$Id: MarkovChain.java,v 1.10 2006/06/21 13:34:42 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Alexei Drummond, Andrew Rambaut
